name: jedcn
body:
> Here are the values that I stand for: honesty, equality, kindness,
> compassion, treating people the way you want to be treated and helping
> those in need.

## Projects

### reveal-ck

Introduction: [jedcn.github.io/reveal-ck][reveal-ck-pages]

Source: [github.com/jedcn/reveal-ck][reveal-ck]

## Talks

### Learning with RSpec

If you look at this 'BDD' tool in the right light, it can be something that helps us explore new technology and better retain and reference what we've found.

Talk: [source][learning-with-rspec-notes]

Slides: [generated][learning-with-rspec-slides-generated], [source][learning-with-rspec-slides-source]

##### Learning with Tools

Everyday we're working with various tools to get our jobs done. We should be sharing these tools, what we like about what, what could be improved. If we do so, we'll be better off for it.

Talk: [source][learning-with-tools-notes]

Slides: [generated][learning-with-tools-slides-generated], [source][learning-with-tools-slides-source]
